#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

bool ispal(int a)
{
	stack<int>s;
	int b=a;
	while(a)
	{
		s.push(a%10);
		a/=10;
	}
	bool tf=true;
	while(!s.empty())
	{
		if(s.top()!=b%10)
		{
			tf=false;
			break;
		}
		s.pop();
		b/=10;
	}
	return tf;
}

int main ()
{
    int t,n,ans;
    sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
	     sc(n);
	     for(int i=n+1;;i++)
	     {
	     	if(ispal(i))
	     	{
	     		pf(i);
	     		break;
			 }
		 }
	}
	return 0;
}
